ygData.subject: Re: My 2 cents on the status of EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: Swap Character between Servers? Are you crazy? This is an onlline world that is consistently changing what good would moving a character to anohter server do?
ygData.messageBody:
Swap Character between Servers? Are you crazy?

This is an onlline world that is consistently changing what good would
moving a character to anohter server do? So your friends are not on the same
server as you.. create a new character on that server and play.



>3) The inability to swap characters between different servers is stupid,
>hopefully Microsoft learns from that major EQ mistake. (I'd still like to
>play with all my friends and co-workers on the same server, instead of
>spread out over 4 servers, pity EQ doesn't realize how critical this
feature
>is to allot of us - who the hell wants to start over? Hint: we'd pay to get
>our chars moved over Verant.) The correct implementation would have been
><log-in:choose character:choose server:play> not what it is now. Major
brain
>fart here.
>
